titles.title: To amend the definition of disabled veteran in chapter 42 of title 38, United States Code, for purposes of employment and training benefits.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Education, Training and Employment.

bill.summary: 6/13/1994--Introduced. Amends Federal provisions relating to employment and training programs for Vietnam era veterans to redefine the term "disabled veteran" to mean any veteran who has a compensable service-connected disability under laws administered by the Department of Veterans Affairs, or a veteran whose discharge or release from active-duty was for a disability incurred or aggravated in the line of duty.
